attributes.action: Legislate against the anti-social effects of Cannabis / Controlled Drug use.
attributes.additional_details:
Cannabis/skunk use is endemic in the streets and parks of London and the minority are disrupting the quality of life for the majority.

Almost every time I go to a public park or walk down a London street I have to endure Cannabis smoke within close proximity.

I believe that the anti-social effects of drug use, criminal, or potentially legal in the future, need to be reviewed and legislated against by implementing the following either way offences to prohibit Cannabis use:

- in all public parks.
- on public or private premises within the close proximity of a child.
- on private property when it's use is less than 15 metres from the boundary of an adjacent residential property.
- or the promotion of Cannabis within a one mile radius of a school.

This petition is not about the decriminalization of controlled drugs, it is about legislating to promote responsibility from those who choose to use controlled drugs legally or illegally.
